ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && RecordType.Name <> "Scale" &&
AND( ISCHANGED(Stage__c), OR( ISPICKVAL( Stage__c , "Bind Order Sent"), ISPICKVAL( Stage__c , "Delivered to Insured") ), (NOT(ISPICKVAL( Category__c, "Cancellation (by Insured)"))), OR( ISBLANK(Premium_Change_Amount__c), ISBLANK(Policy_Fees_Taxed__c), ISBLANK(Wholesale_Fees__c), ISBLANK(State_Tax__c), ISBLANK(State_Stamping_Fee__c), ISBLANK(State_Fees_Other__c), ISBLANK(FS_Fee__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Pricing must be entered when stage is Bind Order Sent or Delivered to Insured. (Put 0's where applicable, don't leave blank).
